::Grounded::
One of Grounded's dandilons warned him of the incoming bot from
behind..."Couldn't have worked out better" he said as he popped into
the groun and instantly popped back up 100 m s of there....They are in
direct route of hitting each other he laughed..

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Dead-End::
> He flys around to face Grounded and continues, heading straight
> towards the bot accelerating as he goes. In mid air, he transformes
> into car mode, and tries to ram Grounded, like Wildrider. "Haha,
> perfume, it had better smell good!"
>
>
> On 1 Apr 2001, at 2:13, gunthers8@n... wrote:
>
> > ::Grounded::
> > Grounded realized just as Wildrider got to the vines that he would go
> > right through them because of his momentum. "Enough time to get away
> > tho" he said...Instantly the huge tree transformed into a tiny plant
> > formin order to move to his safe spot 100 m away should Wildrider be
> > able to hi the ground again where Grounded was now as a plant...If not
> > he would completely over shoot...Grounded reactivated his other
> > gaseous plants and the mists started shooting again behindof Grounded
> > right in front of Wildriders new path becasue the tree was not
there...
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > > Wildrider barreled through the vines towards the ground. With
the added
> > > momentum of gravity, he was traveling to fast to be caught by them,
> > while
> > > he was in the air. He hit the ground, and maneuvered gracefully
(or was
> > > swerving because of bad driving) towards the main tree. Then
when he got
> > > close to the roots, the car lifted itself into the air, and began
> > tumbeling
> > > towards grounded again.
